segments.text: Mister , I have an account now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now , how would you like this check cashed , madam ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . Er , mister , if I want to deposit checks next time . what should I do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just make out a deposit slip and come here during bank hours . That's from 9 a . m . to 3 p . m .
segments.speaker: S2
